LanguageData.CommandAutoRepairDesc: If active, a mechanitor will automatically repair this mechanoid. Repairing a mechanoid drains its energy.
LanguageData.CommandCancelGrowthDesc: Cancel vatgrowth for the current occupant. The occupant will be ejected.
LanguageData.CommandSelectOverseerDesc: Select the mechanitor who is the overseer of this mech.
LanguageData.CommandCancelExtractionDesc: Cancel the extraction process. The contained person will be ejected.
LanguageData.CommandCallBossgroupDesc:
Summon an enemy leader mechanoid along with escorts.

If you defeat the leader mechanoid, it will drop a special chip which you can use to advance your own mechanoid technology.

There are three leader mechanoid types, each summoned a different way, each dropping a different type of chip.
LanguageData.CommandAutoLoadDesc: If active, colonists will automatically load this with {0}.
LanguageData.CommandEjectContentsDesc: Eject all contained {0} onto the ground.
LanguageData.CommandSelectAllMechsDesc: Select all mechanoids controlled by this mechanitor.
LanguageData.CommandToggleTurretDesc: Toggle turret being able to fire at will.\n\nWhen disabled, the turret will not automatically fire. This is useful while sneaking up on enemies.
